1.0.name: wordpress/nyasro-world-day
1.0.description:
Nyasro World Day is the plugin which shows today's or upcoming world event or international day.

  • Use [nyday] to show today's or upcoming day.

If you are a developer then use following PHP code for date converter.

  • To show today's or upcoming day or event :
<?php
            
        if(function_exists('_eNyasro_WorldDayEvent'))
            _eNyasro_WorldDayEvent();
            
    ?>
